<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surprise Snare](/Feats.aspx?ID=2075) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 194 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=78)

**Prerequisites**
[Snarecrafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2074)

</column>

---

You install one of your snares prepared for quick deployment in a space that's occupied by an opponent. It must be a snare that normally takes 1 minute or less to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43). The snare automatically triggers, but it takes a –2 circumstance penalty to any applicable save DC, as well as any attack rolls or other checks the snare attempts.
name: Surprise Snare
